title: In-progress projects
lede:
Quinetucket state agencies collaborate with external partners to answer important research, policy, and programmatic questions. Some projects the QN Office of Strategic Partnerships (OSP) works on directly and others OSP catalyzes and finds research expertise to support. Learn more about in-progress projects here.

OSP created the QN Project Portal to share opportunities for partnering with state agencies on their research needs and for people to express interest in pursuing those opportunities. Have a question about partnerships? Visit our [FAQ](/about) page.
